Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.thinModelComponents

Class ThinPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.thinModelComponents.ThinPlayer
public class ThinPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent the thin player. in particular, this class used only by client, contains every information to represent the state of a client in the game, and contains a bit of logic of the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ThinPlayer​(Player lorenzo)
    this constructor create a thin player starting from a player.
    ThinPlayer​(RealPlayer player)
    this constructor create the player starting from a real player.
    ThinPlayer​(ThinPlayer thinPlayer)
    this constructor create the player starting from another thin player.

  • Constructor Details

    • ThinPlayer

      public ThinPlayer​(RealPlayer player)
      this constructor create the player starting from a real player. in particular, it get all the necessary data from the player, and set them as the attributes of the class
      Parameters:
      player - this is the player from which get all the data to set

    • ThinPlayer

      public ThinPlayer​(ThinPlayer thinPlayer)
      this constructor create the player starting from another thin player. in particular, it is used because the leader cards have to be reconverted from thin leader cards to leader cards, and this constructor do it
      Parameters:
      thinPlayer - this is the thin player to represent

    • ThinPlayer

      public ThinPlayer​(Player lorenzo)
      this constructor create a thin player starting from a player. in particular, this constructor is used only in case of single game, so that the nickname will be the nickname of lorenzo il magnifico, and will be set his track
      Parameters:
      lorenzo - this is the player representing lorenzo il magnifico from which get the track

    • isBasicProductionAffordable

      public boolean isBasicProductionAffordable()
      this method verify if the player can activate the basic production
      Returns:
      true if the player have 2 resources or more, false otherwise

    • isNormalProductionAffordable

      public boolean isNormalProductionAffordable​(java.util.List<DevelopmentCard> deck)
      this method verify if the player can activate the last card contained in the list of cards passed in input
      Parameters:
      deck - this is the list of cards to verify if the last one can be activated
      Returns:
      true if the last card of the deck can be activated

    • isLeaderProductionAffordable

      public boolean isLeaderProductionAffordable​(LeaderCard toVerify)
      this method verify if the leader card passed in input can be activated by the player
      Parameters:
      toVerify - this is the card to verify if the player can activate it
      Returns:
      true if the card passed in input isn't null, if is active and of new production type, and if the player contains the resource associated with the card

    • areLeaderCardsAvailable

      public boolean areLeaderCardsAvailable()
      this method verify if the player own at least one leader card not active
      Returns:
      true if the player own a not active leader card, false if the deck of leader cards is empty or if all the leader cards of the player are active
